claim: Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).

combined_evidence.quote: Study 6 (NCT02285998) enrolled subjects 50 years of age and older, randomized to receive Flublok Quadrivalent or Comparator (Fluarix Quadrivalent, manufactured by GlaxoSmithKline) as an active control [see Clinical Studies (14)]. The safety analysis population included 4328 Flublok Quadrivalent recipients and 4344 Comparator vaccine recipients.
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote explicitly states that Flublok Quadrivalent was evaluated in a trial (Study 6) where it was directly compared against Fluarix Quadrivalent, confirming that the pivotal trial used Fluarix Quadrivalent as the comparator.

combined_evidence.quote: The primary efficacy endpoint of Study 6 was rtPCR-positive, protocol defined ILI due to any strain of influenza. Attack rates and relative vaccine efficacy (rVE), defined as 1 - [Attack rate Flublok Quadrivalent / Attack Rate Comparator], were calculated for the total efficacy population (n=8604) for the primary efficacy endpoint and for several alternative efficacy endpoints (Table 5). ... Comparator=U.S.-licensed quadrivalent inactivated influenza vaccine, Fluarix Quadrivalent, manufactured by GlaxoSmithKline;
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote details the design of Study 6, specifying that the comparator was Fluarix Quadrivalent, and that efficacy was measured directly between Flublok Quadrivalent and Fluarix Quadrivalent, supporting the claim.

combined_evidence.quote: Comparator, Fluarix Quadrivalent, manufactured by GlaxoSmithKline) (n=4489). Among randomized subjects, 58% were female, 80% white, 18% black/African-American, other races, and 5% of Hispanic/Latino ethnicity. A total of 5186 (60%) subjects were...
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote explicitly identifies Fluarix Quadrivalent, manufactured by GlaxoSmithKline, as the comparator in a randomized study population, directly supporting the claim that Flublok Quadrivalent was evaluated against Fluarix Quadrivalent in a pivotal trial.
